Studio Panel

Turn AI responses into reusable artifacts. Generate comparison tables, decision memos, and export in multiple formats.

Save Artifacts

Save any AI response as a named artifact for future reference. Build a library of research findings, comparisons, and recommendations.

  • One-click save from any chat response
  • Custom naming for organization
  • Preserved citations and formatting

Generate Artifacts

Create structured artifacts directly from your research. Generate comparison tables, cost analyses, and decision memos.

  • Comparison tables with source citations
  • Cost analysis breakdowns
  • Executive decision memos

Export Options

Export artifacts in multiple formats for different use cases. Share with stakeholders, import into other tools, or archive for future reference.

  • CSV: For spreadsheet analysis
  • JSON: For programmatic access
  • Markdown: For documentation

Artifact History

Track your artifact history with versioning. Browse past artifacts, compare changes, and maintain a complete audit trail.

  • Complete artifact timeline
  • Version tracking and comparison
  • Decision provenance audit trail
